definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] (place of) lying down, resting- or dwelling-place;—cstr. [[בָּקָר]] ´[[ר]]: Is 65:10 (‖[[נְוֵה חאׂן ]]); sf. [[בִּנְוֵה תַנִּים רִבְחָהּ]] Is 35:7 (cf. Ges:§145m, but Du [[רָֽבְחָה]], sc. flock); [[רִבְחָם]] Je 50:6 (people as sheep); of man, [[רִבְחוֹ]] Pr 24:15 (‖[[נְוֵה חַדְּיק ]]).
